snippet: New York City Audubon will release a report on Tuesday making the case for restoring part of the West Pond at Gateway National Recreation Area, of concern to birders and environmentalists.
abstract: New York City Audubon will release report making case for restoring at least a portion of West Pond at Gateway National Recreation Area to freshwater; Hurricane Sandy broke through an earthen embankment that separated the pond from Jamaica Bay, leaving a permanent breach and filling the pond with saltwater.
lead_paragraph: New York City Audubon will release a report on Tuesday making the case for restoring part of the West Pond at Gateway National Recreation Area, of concern to birders and environmentalists.

headline.main: Environmental Group Proposes Options for Breached Pond at Jamaica Bay in Queens
headline.print_headline: Environmental Group Proposes Options for Breached Pond at Jamaica Bay
